summary: This mod add a new set of High Resolution Light Armor to the game.Female Only
descriptionHtml:
This mod add a new set of High Resolution Light Armor to the game.

Fixes
-Fixed the inability to temper the gloves
-Fixed shoulders and adjusted the overall anatomy(check gallery with comparison vanilla model/blood witch armor shots)
-Added Menus models...sort of lol
-The armor is now craft-able under the glass armor category make more sens since it's a light armor (require now the Glass smithing perk)

*Armor Defense Base Ratings:

-Boots:13
-Cuirass:39
-Gauntlet:18

*Where to find them

-In a Locked Chest located in the abandoned house in Markarth.In the 3rd room(check the Map pic).

-To any forge assuming you have the glass smithing perk.The armor is temper-able too.

*Installation

To install Just extract the contents(including folders) of this rar file into your Skyrim game folder.Comes with an esp file you can check and uncheck in the launch menu


*Term of Use

i don't want any part of this mod being modified and/or used in other mods and games without my consent.
